content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 28, "index": 19}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 15, "index": 36}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft spruce_door. Spruce_door requires placing 3 stacks of spruce_planks in a column in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the spruce_planks from slot 15 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 28, "index": 19}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 15, "index": 36}]

thought: Since the spruce_planks have been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the next stack of spruce_planks to the bottom of the first one. Slot 2 is below slot 1, and therefore I will move the spruce_planks to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 28, "index": 19}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 15, "index": 36}]

thought: Since the spruce_planks have been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the next stack of spruce_planks to the bottom of the second one. Slot 4 is below slot 2, and therefore I will move the spruce_planks to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Ok

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
